sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")

    h1 休假記錄
    div
      table.myTable
        tr
          th 編號    
          th 日期
          th 時間
          th 時數
          th 職務代理人
          th 審核人
          th 審核狀態
        tr(v-for='(record,index) in recordData' :key='index')
          td {{index+1}}
          td.myTd {{record.date}}
          td.myTd {{record.from}}-{{record.to}}
          td.myTd {{record.total}}
          td.myTd {{record.agent}}
          td.myTd {{record.name}}
          td.myTd {{record.state}}

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            recordData: [
            {
                date: "2019-06-30",
                from: "17:30",
                to: "18:30",
                total: "60",
                agent:"蔡奇宏",
                name: "許素朱",
                state: "菜奇宏審核中"
            }
            ],
            color: {
            but: "#333333",
            bgc: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
h1,p {
    color: #FFF;
    
}
</style>
